text: Læa brrda phu khwnkhway thakhwam chaw kar txbthæn khwam chaw dwy khwam chaw chen deiywkan khwam tatxy ca pkkhlum phwk khea mimi phu khumkan phwk khea hı phn ca kxallxhˌ di semuxn wa bıhna khxng phwk khea thuk khlum wi dwy swn hnung khxng klangkhun xan mud thub chn hela ni khux chaw nrk phwk khea ca xyu nı nan tlxd kal
